data.title: Set up in seconds
data.description: In just a few clicks, you’ll be ready to have meaningful conversations from anywhere in the world.

data.title: Text message automation
data.description: Boost productivity and efficiency with drip automated, smarter conversations that enhance your outreach.

data.title: Leverage insights
data.description: Goodby guesswork. Hello, better decisions. Monitor metrics in real-time to start making measurable improvements.

data.title: Accelerate your outreach
data.description: Whether you use Zeitblast as your primary CRM or integrate it with others using our one-click Push to CRM feature, experience advanced CRM capabilities and seamless integration.

data.title: Unmatched Reliability
data.subTitle: We ensure you never miss a lead with Zeitblast unparalleled reliability. Experience zero downtime and maintain a steady flow of leads without interruption.
data.cardSubTitle: Lead Generation Manager @ Encore Real Estate
data.cardDescription: We switched from another text marketing platform to Zeitblast. Unreliability and down time was a huge concern for us, since we switched to Zeitblast not once we experienced any downtime and the deliverability is amazing.

data.title: Build in A2P 10DLC compliance feature
data.subTitle: Stay compliant effortlessly with our built-in features designed to meet all regulatory requirements. Focus on your business while we ensure your campaigns are always in line with the latest regulations.
data.cardDescription: Compliance was a huge concern for us, but with the built-in features, we now manage our campaigns confidently and without any legal worries.

cards.title: I'm Serious
cards.description: Commit to success with our 'I'm Serious' Plan, packed with advanced tools and dedicated support for real estate professionals ready to get started.
cards.subTitle: What’s Included
features: Send up to 15,000 Initial Outbound Messages
Unlimited drip campaigns
Free unlimited inbound & outbound active conversations
Guaranteed Highest Delivery & Response
All local numbers with unlimited exchanges
Built-in 10DLC compliance feature

cards.title: Time to Scale
cards.description: Expand your outreach with the 'Time to Scale' Plan, designed to help ambitious professionals grow their real estate business and dominate their market.
cards.subTitle: All features from the I'm Serious plan, plus:
features: Send up to 30,000 initial outbound messages
3 licensed account users (agents)
Advanced area code monitoring for highest deliverability
Built-in 10DLC compliance feature

cards.title: Market Dominator
cards.description: Ready to dominate the market? The 'Market Dominator' Plan is designed for top-tier professionals with a full-scale operation, offering wide resources.
cards.subTitle: All features from the Time to Scale plan, plus:
features: Send up to 65,000 initial outbound messages
Dedicated account manager
Customized strategy sessions and personalized support
Built-in 10DLC compliance feature

jumpStart.title: Jumpstart JV
jumpStart.description: Generate Leads, Close Deals, and Learn the Ropes with Comprehensive Support.Are you ready to dive into the real estate market but need a little extra help to get started? Our 'Jumpstart JV Plan' is perfect for entry-level real estate professionals who want to generate leads and close deals with unparalleled support and guidance
jumpStart.subTitle: What’s Included
features: Affordable Entry: For just $195/month, gain access to all features included in our 'I'm Serious' plan.
Unlimited drip campaigns
Lead Generation Power: Send out 15,000 outbound messages every month to kickstart your lead generation.
Comprehensive Full Support: Receive expert assistance with acquisition calls, closing calls, contractual agreements, and disposition of all your deals.
Learning and Growth: Benefit from our extensive training on various exit strategies, including but not limited to novation and subject to.
Joint Venture Partnership: Collaborate with us on deals, sharing profits with a 50/50 split. You'll learn while you earn, gaining valuable experience along the way.

doneForU.title: Done-for-You
doneForU.description: Struggling to generate leads while closing deals? With Zeitblast’s Done-for-You Lead Gen Subscription, we take care of the entire lead generation process — no time, expertise, or effort needed on your end. You focus on closing deals, we handle the rest.
doneForU.subTitle: What’s Included
features: Fully Managed SMS Campaigns: No need to learn or run campaigns. Our experts handle everything from strategy to execution
Unlimited drip campaigns
Virtual Assistant Hiring & Management:We source, train, and manage skilled VAs to support your lead generation efforts.
Daily Lead Delivery: Receive 3+ vetted, qualified leads delivered directly to your CRM every day.
Complete Operational Oversight: Forget about the complexities of operations. We handle all logistics, systems, and workflows.
Seamless CRM Integration: Leads are automatically pushed to your CRM for easy follow-up and tracking.
Expert Execution: Leverage our proven processes and industry knowledge for consistent lead flow.
